class.name: ImmediateGeometry
class.brief_description: Node to draw simple geometry from code, ala OpenGL 1.x

method.name: add_sphere
method.description: Simple helper to draw a uvsphere, with given latitudes, longitude and radius.

method.name: add_vertex
method.description: Add a vertex with the currently set color/uv/etc.

method.name: begin
method.description: Begin drawing (And optionally pass a texture override). When done call end(). For more information on how this works, search for glBegin() glEnd() references. For the type of primitive, use the [Mesh].PRIMITIVE_* enumerations.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear everything that was drawn using begin/end.

method.name: end
method.description: Call this when done adding a batch of geometry, otherwise it can't be displayed.

method.name: set_color
method.description: Set the color that the next vertex will use to be drawn.

method.name: set_normal
method.description: Set the normal that the next vertex will use to be drawn.

method.name: set_tangent
method.description: Set the tangent (and binormal facing) that the next vertex will use to be drawn.

method.name: set_uv
method.description: Set the UV that the next vertex will use to be drawn.

method.name: set_uv2
method.description: Set the second layer of UV that the next vertex will use to be drawn.
